title: Gary Numan - Asylum 1 (FLAC)
description:
Some days ago, I saw Gary live for the first time after a 30 years absence.
It was absolutely unbelivable. He was better than ever! So I decided to upload the Asylum CD's. Here's no.1! Please seed.


Gary Numan - Asylum 1

A Japanese 4-CD collection, that compiles The early Albums: The Plan, Tubeway Army, Replicas and The Pleasure Principle, along with B-sides, singles, outtakes and cuts from Living Ornaments '79 and Living Ornaments '80 (the bulk of the latter two being released as Asylum 3). ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s exhaustive, with two booklets, containing lyrics and photos galore. For the Numan-Fan, an impressively compact way to gather the early material together, beautifully mastered and presented.
